claims_summary: CIA officer (1947-1967) directed Berlin Tunnel, ZR/RIFLE assassination program, and Task Force W anti-Castro operations, recruited organized crime for assassination attempts, reveals institutional CIA assassination capability

berlin_tunnel: 1954-1956 operation: Tapped Soviet communications in East Berlin
Declassified CIA history: Operation details now public
Intelligence value: Signals intelligence from Soviet military
Discovery 1956: Soviets found tunnel, operation ended
zr_rifle_assassination_program: Church Committee revelations (1975): Documented ZR/RIFLE program
Harvey as chief: Testimony and documents show operational role
'Executive Action' capability: Euphemism for assassination program
Richard Bissell creation: Deputy Director authorized program, Harvey executed
Institutional capability: Program shows CIA systematized assassinations
cia_mafia_collaboration: Johnny Roselli recruitment: Harvey's contact with Chicago mob documented
Sam Giancana involvement: Church Committee documented mob boss role
Castro assassination plots: Multiple attempts using mafia contacts
Church Committee testimony: Participants confirmed CIA-mafia operations
Poison pills, rifles, explosives: Various assassination methods attempted
task_force_w: Largest CIA station: JMWAVE in Miami, hundreds of operatives
Cuban exile coordination: Multiple anti-Castro organizations
Cuban Missile Crisis conflict: Harvey's operations violated Kennedy policy
Autonomous commando raids: Harvey authorized despite White House objections
kennedy_administration_conflicts: Robert Kennedy clashes: Attorney General opposed Harvey's methods
JFK policy violations: Harvey operations exceeded authorization
Reassignment to Rome (1963): Removed after Cuban Missile Crisis conflicts
Protected by Helms: Despite conflicts, Harvey career protected by CIA
concealment_mechanisms: Record destruction: Many files destroyed before Church Committee
Harvey death (1976): Died before comprehensive testimony
Mafia cutout: Organized crime provided deniability

validation_status: Extensively documented through Church Committee investigation, declassified CIA histories, testimony from mafia participants, and internal CIA records - some operational details remain classified
